data.name: GasolineGypsiesGame
data.detailed_description:
The Gasoline Gypsies Game is a retro 2-D action platform game. Play as Caleb, Steve, Joe, and Neal as they try to make it to the top.

As a member of the Gasoline Gypsies you will run, jump, and rock your way through various levels. Find hidden items and power-up along the way. Use your instruments to defeat enemies. You will encounter broken strings, zombie tuners, deranged groupies, and more on your way to the stage. At the end of each level you will face off with a rival group.

Listen to 8-bit renditions of original Gasoline Gypsies music as you travel across Michigan. On your adventure you will unlock levels, costumes, mini games and more. Compete for dominance on the online leaderboard or team up with a friend for local co-op. The Gasoline Gypsies Game is a colorful non violent game intended for all ages.

Features
14 Levels & Bosses
3 Unique Power-Ups
Sound Test
Difficulty Settings
Online Leaderboard
Local Co-op (with 2nd gamepad)
Unlockable Achievements, Costumes, & Mini Games

data.short_description: Gasoline Gypsies Game is a retro 2-D action platform game based off the hit band The Gasoline Gypsies. Run, jump, and jam your way to the top. Listen to 8-bit renditions of original Gasoline Gypsies music.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1660 SUPER
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
